name: progress-up-svelte
description: Enables file uploading with progress indicators in Svelte applications.
readme: # Progress-up Svelte HTTPs uploader ![Progress-up](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girish1729/progress-up/main//images/progress-up-logo.svg) ## Progress types ![Progess types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girish1729/progress-up/main/backend/public/images/progress-types.png) ## What is this? This is a HTML5 multiple files Upload plugin with progress bar indicator. This uses the HTTP File API protocol to show continuous progress. >This is the very first attempt to create a clean no frills upload plugin >in 100% Typescript. Now available for Angular, Vue, Svelte and React. [Canonical home page](https://progress-up.live) # Demo [Live demo](https://luxury-kangaroo-af6a24.netlify.app/) ## Instructions ```shell $ npm install progress-up-svelte # or $ yarn add progress-up-svelte ``` ## Configuration ```config.json { "uploadURL": "https://localhost:2324/uploadmultiple", "filesName": "uploadFiles", "progressType": "Line" } ``` This is located inside the root of your project. Typically index.html is served from this directory. ## Detailed instructions - [Developer docs](https://progress-up.live/docs) - [Live demo](https://progress-up.live/demo) - [Svelte docs](https://progress-up.live/docs/svelte-docs) ## Screenshots gallery ### This is before upload ![Preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girish1729/progress.up/main/images/progress-up-preview2.png) ### This is after uploading ![Fully uploaded](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girish1729/progress.up/main/images/progress-up-fullyuploaded.png) ## Why should you care? If you allow multiple large files upload then a progress indicator is a cool way to give user feedback. Nowadays HTML5 File API based progress is the best way to achieve your goal. ## Screencast of upload ![Progess.up screencast](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/girish1729/progress.up/main/images/progress-uploading.gif) ## Contact You can [DM me on Twitter](https://twitter.com/girish1729) for help/suggestions. You can [follow me](https://twitter.com/intent/follow?screen_name=girish1729 ) for updates. ## Tweet this to followers ## Buy me a coffee to accelerate development
